name: youtube-live-tts
description: Real-time YouTube Live Chat Text-to-Speech (TTS) using ElevenLabs AI voices
readme_summary: This repository provides a real-time text-to-speech service for YouTube live streams, converting chat messages into spoken audio using ElevenLabs AI voices. It features a web dashboard for configuration and monitoring, with options for customization, spam protection, and cross-platform compatibility.
primary_use_case: To enable YouTube live stream viewers' chat messages to be read aloud in real-time using AI-generated voices, enhancing viewer engagement and accessibility.
cover_image_prompt: A vibrant, stylized illustration of a YouTube live chat feed transforming into audible sound waves. Imagine a stream of colorful chat bubbles flowing from a stylized YouTube interface on one side, morphing into glowing, ethereal sound waves that emanate outwards on the other. A subtle, friendly AI assistant character is overseeing this transformation, perhaps with a small, clean UI element displaying the 'youtube-live-tts' logo. The background is a soft, gradient blend of blues and purples, suggesting a digital, modern atmosphere. The overall mood is engaging and futuristic, emphasizing seamless communication and AI integration. 3D isometric illustration style, high detail, smooth rendering.

name: ShowUI-Aloha
description: Human-taught Computer-use Agent Designed for Real Windows and MacOS Desktops.
readme_summary: ShowUI-Aloha is a human-taught computer-use agent for Windows and macOS that learns workflows from recorded demonstrations. It generalizes these learnings to plan and execute new task variants, performing OS-level actions like clicks, typing, and scrolling.
key_features: Plans new tasks based on learned workflows
Generalizes from single demonstrations to task families
primary_use_case: Automating repetitive computer tasks by learning from human demonstrations.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, anthropomorphic robot assistant with a magnifying glass and a notepad, observing a human performing a computer task (e.g., booking a flight online). The robot is subtly capturing the screen and mouse movements, represented by glowing digital trails. In the background, a stylized blueprint or flowchart visualizes the learned workflow. Small, abstract icons representing clicks, keyboard input, and scrolling float around the robot, indicating its capabilities. The scene is bright and clean, with a focus on the learning process, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a friendly color palette.

name: tiktok-live-recorder
description: ðŸŽ¥âœ¨ A TikTok live streaming recorder tool written in Python. Capture and relive your favorite TikTok moments effortlessly. ðŸŽ¥âœ¨
readme_summary: This Python tool records TikTok live streams, capturing both audio and video. It allows users to save and revisit live content for later viewing or analysis, serving creators, researchers, and general users interested in preserving TikTok live moments.
key_features: Supports recording via username, URL, or room ID
Offers different recording modes (manual, automatic, followers)
Allows customization of checking intervals and output directories
Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, Linux, Android via Termux)
primary_use_case: Recording and saving TikTok live streams for later viewing.
cover_image_prompt: A digital archivist, depicted as a friendly robot with a vintage film reel dispenser, is actively capturing a vibrant TikTok live stream emanating from a glowing screen. The robot's arms are extending, one holding a microphone to capture audio, the other a camera lens to record video, both feeding into the film reel. The film reel itself is visibly spooling out, showing miniature, recognizable TikTok icons and moments. Subtle UI elements showing recording status and a small, stylized 'TikTok Live Recorder' logo are integrated into the robot's design. The background is a clean, modern studio space with soft, ambient lighting, emphasizing the act of preservation. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a bright, engaging color palette.
